sections.name: Hero Banner
sections.sectionMetadataReason: Background is hero's full-width image, not section container styling

sequences.description: Large background image with overlay text — eyebrow 'MISSION-CRITICAL COMMUNICATIONS', heading 'America's first responder network', descriptive paragraph, and 'Check eligibility' CTA button
sequences.reason: Background image with text overlay layout requires Hero block structure. Obvious match.

sections.name: Offers / Discounts
sections.sectionMetadataReason: White background, no distinct styling needed

sequences.description: Centered heading 'Discounts for first responders' and subheading 'Switch to FirstNet and take advantage of special offers available'
sequences.reason: Author can type heading and subheading normally

sequences.description: Three offer cards with image, eyebrow tag, heading, description text, expandable legal/offer details, and CTA links
sequences.reason: Repeating structured pattern with image + content per item. Obvious match with cards block (2-column rows: image | content).

sections.name: Why FirstNet Features
sections.sectionMetadataReason: Dark navy background applies to all content in this section (heading, columns, CTA, legal text)

sequences.description: Centered heading 'Why FirstNet for 5G public safety' and subheading 'Built from the ground up to support emergency services'
sequences.reason: Author can type heading and subheading normally

sequences.description: Three items in a row, each with pictogram/icon image, bold title, and description paragraph
sequences.reason: Three side-by-side items with icon+title+description. Obvious match with columns (three columns) variant.
Single CTA link — author types it normally

sequences.description: Small legal footnote text about FirstNet 5G coverage
sequences.reason: Small paragraph of legal text — author types it normally

sections.name: Latest News
sections.sectionMetadataReason: White background, no distinct styling needed

sequences.description: Heading 'Latest news from public safety's network'
Three news cards with image, eyebrow category tag, heading, description, and 'Read more' CTA link
sequences.reason: Repeating structured pattern with image + content per item. Same cards pattern as Section 2 offers.

sequences.description: Centered 'Explore more from the FirstNet community' link with arrow
sequences.reason: Single link — author types it normally

sections.name: Contact CTA
sections.sectionMetadataReason: Light grey background distinguishes this section from surrounding white sections

sequences.description: Centered heading 'Connect with a FirstNet specialist' and 'Contact us' CTA button
sequences.reason: Heading and CTA link — author types them normally

sections.name: Email Signup Banner
sections.sectionMetadataReason: Blue accent background (#009fdb) provides container styling for form block

sequences.description: Heading 'LEARN ABOUT AMERICA'S PUBLIC SAFETY NETWORK', subtext 'Get connected', email subscription form with email input, category dropdown, submit button, and legal consent text
sequences.reason: Interactive form with inputs and dropdown selector requires Form block structure.

hero.note: Image + text overlay. Content model: picture, heading, paragraphs, links.

cards.structure: N rows (one per card): 2 columns [image | heading, paragraph(s)]
cards.note: Each card = 1 row with image in col 1, text content in col 2.

columns.structure: 1 row: 3 columns [image, heading, paragraph(s) | image, heading, paragraph(s) | image, heading, paragraph(s)]
columns.note: Three side-by-side columns, each with icon/image, heading, description.

form.structure: 2 rows: row 1 = form definition JSON link, row 2 = submission endpoint link
form.note: Form block references a JSON definition for field structure.
